snippet: A party appeals panel upheld the five-year suspension of the firebrand youth leader Julius Malema from the African National Congress Youth League.
abstract: South African appeals panel of the governing African National Congress upholds the five-year suspension of Julius Malema, leader of the powerful African National Congress Youth League; ruling effectively derails the political career of a man who once played kingmaker to current Pres Jacob Zuma.
lead_paragraph: A party appeals panel upheld the five-year suspension of the firebrand youth leader Julius Malema from the African National Congress Youth League.

headline.seo: A.N.C. Upholds Suspension of Youth Leader Malema
headline.main: A.N.C. Keeps Suspension of a Leader
headline.print_headline: A.N.C. Keeps Suspension Of a Leader
